verses.name: Luke 15:21
verses.text: And the son said unto him, Father, I have sinned against heaven, and in thy sight, and am no more worthy to be called thy son.

verses.name: Luke 15:22
verses.text: But the father said to his servants, Bring forth the best robe, and put it on him; and put a ring on his hand, and shoes on his feet:

verses.name: Luke 15:23
verses.text: And bring hither the fatted calf, and kill it; and let us eat, and be merry:

verses.name: Luke 15:24
verses.text: For this my son was dead, and is alive again; he was lost, and is found. And they began to be merry.
